paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Top Tier Experience
detailsData.content: Bick Law offers clients a world-class environmental law practice with attorneys who have interdisciplinary experience in business, law, and science.

detailsData.title: Business Focus
detailsData.content: Bick Law is exclusively focused on meeting the needs of business clients, providing top-tier environmental counseling in matters that intersect with critical business activities.

detailsData.title: Bench Strength
detailsData.content: The firm's collective experience and exclusive focus on environmental law make its bench strength equal to top-tier law firms, capable of handling any environmental matter clients face.

address: 520 Newport Center Drive, STE 750, Newport Beach, CA 92660
subHeading: Mastering The Balancing Act For Our Clients
valueProp: Bick Law LLP is a top-tier environmental law firm committed to providing world-class environmental litigation, compliance, and transactional services to businesses, tailored by industry and personalized to each client's needs.
CTA: Before The Elephant Enters the Room
